H0.text: The 1958 film ‘Gigi’ was based on the novel by which French author. Simone de Beauvoir

H1.text: The 1958 film ‘Gigi’ was based on the novel by which French author. Gustave Flaubert

H2.text: The 1958 film ‘Gigi’ was based on the novel by which French author. Marcel Proust

H3.text: The 1958 film ‘Gigi’ was based on the novel by which French author. Colette

A4.text: Colette is best known in the English‑speaking world for her 1944 novella Gigi, which was the basis for the 1958 film.
